pageTitle: Itinerary for Saturday, August 20, 2016 | Prime Minister of Canada
articleHtml:
Itinerary for the Prime Minister, Justin Trudeau, for Saturday, August 20, 2016:

Toronto, Ontario

2:00 p.m. The Prime Minister will attend the Taste of Manila.

Festival Stage, North West Side
Corner of Bathurst Street and Wilson Avenue
Toronto, ON

Notes for media:

  • Open media coverage
  • Media should arrive no later than 1:30 p.m.

Kingston, Ontario

8:30 p.m. The Prime Minister will attend The Tragically Hip concert.

Rogers K-Rock Centre
1 The Tragically Hip Way
Kingston, ON

Media Appearance

7:15 p.m. An interview with the Prime Minister will be broadcast on CBC.

PMO Media Relations:
media@pmo-cpm.gc.ca
613-957-5555
